_comment: Created by EFisher on 24/01/2014 16:56:51 using v2.0
title: How has the proportion of social care users who feel safe changed?
analysis_commentary: The proportion of people who felt as safe as they wanted to increased from 62.4% in 2010/11 to 63.8% in 2012/13; an increase of 1.4%. However as the data in 2010/11 is un-weighted it is more appropriate to look at the 1.2% increase from 2011/12 to 2012/13.
